channel.title: Namespace on INFINI Pizza
channel.description: Recent content in Namespace on INFINI Pizza

item.title: Create a namespace
item.description: Create a namespace # Creates a new namespace. Examples # If creating a website namespace, the following request creates a new namespace called website: PUT /_namespace/website Request # PUT /_namespace/<name> Path parameters # <name> (Required, string) The name of the namespace. Namespace names must meet the following criteria: Lowercase only Cannot include \ /, *, ?, ", <, >, |, , ,, # Cannot start with -, _, + Cannot be .

item.title: Delete a namespace
item.description: Delete a namespace # Delete a exists namespace. Examples # The following request delete the namespace called website: DELETE /_namespace/website Request # DELETE /_namespace/<name> Path parameters # <name> (Optional, string) The name of the namespace that you want to delete.
